I'm so very confused at what I have created...
(Some updates nullify previous notable neural nets)

Logistics:
I wanted to create my own version of a Tic-Tac-Toe AI but instead I created the monstrosity 
that is the combination between a half-baked attempt at a Neural Network and a Genetic Algorithm.
I am honestly amazed that it functions and it genuinly scares me at how... not terrible it seems to be...
